ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL( Stage__c, "In Stamping / Accounting"), ($Profile.Name = "Operations - Policy Service/Binding"), DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2020-02-01"), ISBLANK(IndustryAcc__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Ah! Industry is blank. Please populate the industry field on the account page.
